ratings.comment: Trevor is my TA for Physics 202, easily one of the best I have had.  The professor is not real clear, but discussion with Trevor makes everything so much clearer.  He is an interesting character but extremely lovable.  He doesn't make us do unnecessary parts of lab, only the parts that will help us.  All in all, Trevor makes physics interesting.

This class is definitely not one you want to take if you don't like science.  The homework can get really complicated as much of it seems like physics but still, there's only one assignment every 2 weeks or so.  Also, the midterms are simple, no math, and the TA, who covers all the sections, Lou, is awesome and will explain anything you don't get.
He's boring. And the homework is a pain. Do not take this as an elective, it's not interesting at all.
